promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young basic chameleon steel-type pokemon holding a metallic lance. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or chameleon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Lanceleon, a a chibi young basic chameleon steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Time Bellow, Bass Control. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "chameleon", "steel" or "Lanceleon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, chameleon-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey shadows
generatedDescription: Adept mountain dweller, this tiny titan manipulates time and resonates with deep sounds. Its metallic skin repels foes.
